content: 6. Mike Williams. Makes sense now why Clemson was saying having him on the field last year would have made a huge difference. His ability is ridiculous and he forced Bama’s D to change its scheme down the stretch. I knew he was talented but didn’t know the full scope of his capabilities and how big time he can be when it matters. His along with Saquon Barkely in the Rose Bowl are the two biggest individual performances that stood out the most, to me, during this bowl season.
